definitions.definition: control or maintain the rate or speed of (a machine or process) so that it operates properly.
examples: a hormone that regulates metabolism and organ function
synonyms: manage "the flow of the river has been regulated"

definitions.definition: control or supervise (something, especially a company or business activity) by means of rules and regulations.
examples: the organization that regulates fishing in the region

definitions.definition: set (a clock or other apparatus) according to an external standard.
